mapper.select: SELECT L.CH_NM, M.USER_ID, A.FILE_NM FROM LOGER L JOIN MEMBER M ON(L.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(L.USER_NO = A.USER_NO) WHERE A.AM_TY = '회원'

select * from (SELECT SUM(C.AMOUNT_PRICE) as amount_price, SUM(RE_COUNT) as re_count, SUM(C_COUNT) as c_count FROM LOGER L JOIN CALCULATE C ON(L.CH_NO = C.CH_NO) JOIN REPORT R ON(L.USER_NO = R.RE_TARGET))
